name: Calculate the repair cost of a rectangular room
instruction:
Write a function `remodelingCost` that takes parameters:

* `side1Foot` - length of one side of the room in feet,
* `side2Foot` - length of the second side of the room in feet,
* `costPerFoot` - repair cost per square foot


Example of repair cost calculation:

```javascript
remodelingCost(10, 10, 100) // 10000
remodelingCost(20, 20, 100) // 40000
remodelingCost(30, 30, 100) // 90000
```
